reviewText: The Whistler is in my opinion is one of the best radio shows.  At this time I have not listened to all of these.  I also like the movies,they probably not considered cinema classics, I Like them.Chris.
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES

reviewText: Man, if you like the good ol' stuff, snap this up. All eight Whistler movies from the 1940s, including the four directed by William Castle, plus 230 hours worth of Whistler radio programs. This is a collection to enjoy for the rest of your life.
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES

reviewText: Excellent.  Video and audio is very good.  Great film noir.  Each story is different and keeps your attention to the very end to see what happens.  In the Hitchcock genre.
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES

reviewText: I have seen all of the films and i can say that they are  excellent.People who love film noir should should check these out as they are very good.
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES

reviewText: These were good quality, fun movies on a par with Universal's Inner Sanctum Mystery series. Several were even better than the more well-known Lon Chaney films.
summary: A series that deserves more recognition
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES

reviewText: This is a top of the line dvd set.  I have looked for this for years, and this was the first that I could find it, so I snatched it up.  If you like the Whistler, you will love this set.  Picture and Audio quality are excellent!
Title: THE WHISTLER - THE FILMS COLLECTION - 4 DVD - 8 MOVIES
